content: bravo & congrats for your excellent article!!! to us, Europeans, it’s quasi-impossible to figure out WHY and HOW these useless, futile, empty “folks” exist?!… you’re sooo right: they’re NOT real, but fake or “alternative facts”(LOL!) 100%!!! :-) my very best, tons of inspiration and friendly greetings from France, “old Europe” — cheers!
